title: Factor out the greatest common factor

title: Factor out the greatest common factor
Rewrite the individual terms
text: Are there any ways to write $$27q^3$$ into $$a^3$$? If so, what is a?

subHints.title: Rewrite the individual terms
subHints.text: Given that $${\left(a b\right)}^c$$ where a, $$b$$ and c are real numbers, $${\left(a b\right)}^c=a^c b^c$$, $$27q^3=27q^3$$ and $$27=3^3$$, we can rewrite the expression as 27*q**3=(3**3)*(q**3)=(?)**3. What is (?)?

speech: Are there any ways to write , 27 q cubed,  into  a cubed ? If so, what is a?
pacedSpeech: Are there any ways to write  , 27 q cubed,

title: Use sum of cube rule
text: We observe that $$p^3+27q^3=p^3+{\left(3q\right)}^3$$ which is the sum of cubes. We can use the sum of cubes rule to factor. Sum of cube rule: $$a^3+b^3$$ can be factored completely into $$\left(a+b\right) \left(a^2-a b+b^2\right)$$.
speech: We observe that  p cubed plus 27 q cubed is equal to p cubed plus parentheses 3 q  cubed  which is the sum of cubes. We can use the sum of cubes rule to factor. Sum of cube rule:  a cubed plus b cubed  can be factored completely into  parentheses a plus b,  times parentheses, a squared minus a b plus b squared  .
pacedSpeech: We observe that   p cubed plus 27 q cubed is equal to p cubed plus  3 q  cubed
which is the sum of cubes. We can use the sum of cubes rule to factor. Sum of cube rule:   a cubed plus b cubed
can be factored completely into    a plus b,  times , a squared minus a b plus b squared

title: Use sum of cube rule
text: By using the sum of cube rule, we can factor $$p^3+27q^3$$ as?
speech: By using the sum of cube rule, we can factor , p cubed plus 27 q cubed  as?
pacedSpeech: By using the sum of cube rule, we can factor  , p cubed plus 27 q cubed

title: Put together all factors
text: Since there is no way to further factor $$p+3q$$ and $$p^2-p 3q+{\left(3q\right)}^2$$, $$2p^3+54q^3$$ can be factored completely into $$2\left(p+3q\right) \left(p^2-p 3q+{\left(3q\right)}^2\right)$$.
speech: Since there is no way to further factor  p plus, 3 q  and  p squared minus p 3 q, plus parentheses 3 q  squared ,  2 p cubed plus 54 q cubed,  can be factored completely into  2 times, parentheses, p plus 3 q,  times parentheses p squared minus p 3 q, plus, parentheses 3 q  squared  .
pacedSpeech: Since there is no way to further factor   p plus, 3 q
and   p squared minus p 3 q, plus  3 q  squared
can be factored completely into   2 times, , p plus 3 q,  times  p squared minus p 3 q, plus,  3 q  squared
